mapper.select: select a.material_number, a.material_name, a.unit, a.sale_unitprice, a.material_item, a.buy_unitprice, a.image, a.material_classification, a.logistics_safety_stock, a.cost, b.material_number, c.client_name from material a join company_material b on a.material_number = b.material_number join supplier c on b.client_id = c.client_id order by a.material_number

select a.material_number, a.material_name, a.unit, a.sale_unitprice, a.material_item, a.buy_unitprice, a.image, a.material_classification, a.logistics_safety_stock, a.cost, b.material_number, c.client_name from material a join company_material b on a.material_number = b.material_number join supplier c on b.client_id = c.client_id where a.material_number = #{materialNumber}
mapper.insert:
select nvl(max(material_number),0)+1 from material
insert into material( material_number, material_name, unit, sale_unitprice, material_item, buy_unitprice, image, material_classification, logistics_safety_stock, cost )values( #{materialNumber} #{materialName}, #{unit}, #{saleUnitprice}, #{materialItem}, #{buyUnitprice}, #{image}, #{materialClassification}, #{logisticsSafetyStock}, #{cost} )
mapper.update: update material set material_number = #{materialNumber}, material_name = #{materialName}, unit = #{unit}, sale_unitprice = #{saleUnitprice}, material_item = #{materialItem}, buy_unitprice = #{buyUnitprice}, image = #{image}, material_classification = #{materialClassification}, logistics_safety_stock = #{logisticsSafetyStock}, cost = #{cost} where material_number = #{materialNumber}
